meanings.sent1: The mayor is reelecting his team for another term in office.
meanings.sent2: After his successful first term, the president is considering reelecting himself for a second term.
meanings.sent3: The students joked that they were reelecting their class clown as the school president.
meanings.sent4: The company is reelecting its top performer as the employee of the year.
meanings.sent5: The community is reelecting the beloved librarian for her dedication to literacy.

meanings.definition: The act of choosing someone for a position again.
meanings.sent1: The reelecting of the principal was met with mixed reactions from the school staff.
meanings.sent2: The reelecting of the board members was a smooth process due to their excellent performance.
meanings.sent3: The reelecting of the class president sparked a friendly competition among the candidates.
meanings.sent4: The reelecting of the team captain brought a sense of continuity to the sports team.
meanings.sent5: The reelecting of the committee chairperson highlighted the trust and confidence of the members.
